contents.text: Welcome to 10 by 10 in San Francisco, where we help independent recruiters and agencies earn more in placement fees.
For software solutions and platform information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our product team.

navigationGoals: Get a concise overview of the platform’s main features
I’d like a high-level overview of your recruitment software to see if it fits my needs as a veteran moving into recruiting.
Get a technical product overview of the 10 by 10 platform, including API integrations and feature architecture.
I need a simple, easy-to-understand overview of your software platform.
I’d like a concise overview of your recruitment platform’s core features, particularly its data analytics and automation capabilities.

contents.text: For pricing and package options, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve our pricing packages.

navigationGoals: Review pricing tiers and choose the best plan
I need to review your pricing plans and package options so I can pick one that works with my startup budget.
Retrieve detailed software pricing and package options, covering license models and volume tiers.
I’d like to learn about your pricing plans and package options.
I need detailed pricing information on your subscription tiers and package options, including any student or academic discounts.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you with our service specialists.

navigationGoals: Inquire about signing up for your recruitment service
I’m exploring your talent acquisition services and want information on what new clients receive.
Inquire about onboarding a new talent acquisition service and custom candidate sourcing workflows.
I want to ask about the new talent acquisition services you offer.
I’m interested in starting a new talent acquisition engagement to source physics research interns through your service.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you with our client support team.

navigationGoals: Get help resolving an issue with my current talent acquisition account
As a current user, I need help troubleshooting my dashboard—I can’t view my candidate pipeline.
Request client support for my current account, specifically API data sync error resolution.
I need help with support for a talent acquisition service I’m already using.
I need support accessing my existing talent acquisition dashboard and an update on the status of my current candidate search.
